data.message:
I wonder? If it did go down. What would Drake say to Eminem.
I know Eminem would have said some crazy ass lyrics about drake and the whole internet would be full of Eminem parts dissing Drake.
But Eminem done with the fame.
You rest now my Rap God.

replies.message: Kill all the Muslims bomb their homes
Em once said he almost dissed lil wayne. But instead he got a track with him. He became a nice guy

Look back on Forever, No Love, and Drop the world. Eminem subliminally disses Wayne in all of em. "So why the fuck would i join em when I beat em" basically firing back at Wayne because prior to "No Love" Wayne  was talking alot of smack saying Eminem was afraid to do a track with him because he'd get shown up... there's a shit ton more verses from the 3 tracks I listed where if you look at the lyrics, it may be hard to see at first but after a little research its clear cut he subliminally dissed Wayne along with Kanye and Drake.

Why those 3 never said anything? Idk but my guess is either they were afraid to, didn't want a beef over an Eminem diss because its well known when Eminem disses someone its basically a sign you've made it, OR the final guess is they just don't know... sorry for the lengthy comment btw lol I love talking Eminem with people especially other fans
Oh another easy verse to tell it, "They call me a freak cause I like to spit on these pussies before I eat em" that one doesn't really need further explanation lol
